sentence: Some say this hotel is slightly tired in places but going through an update and certainly still a very high standard no complaints in fact as it was Chinese New year the hotel laid on a tour of the city complementary for clients who wanted to see the real Singapore
Only remark rooms needed a bit of facelift
The cons despite renovations outside aspect can appear to be a bit dated
Maintenance one fine morning when my fiancé and I were still in our sleep and the privacy light was on there was one ring at the door bell followed by somebody attempt to open and walk into our room
Badly needs a renovation as soon as possible
Feels like they have not refurbished in the last 20 years
On arrival we were told that although we had stated a non smoking room a smoking room had been refreshed would we look at it
Whilst there is building work going on refurbishing the Tower Wing it did not effect our stay in the Valley Wing or using the pool or other hotel facilities
The hotel is undergoing extensive renovation and this should have been made clear at the time of booking
However more could be done to upkeep the carpets which did not look that great
We stayed in the recently refurbished room extremely comfortable service was amazing and the grounds superb
The main breakfast area is huge with a wide variety however I would say it needs updating since it has a cold feeling of 60s 70s
In renovating the hotel you tool out its ’ character
Good renovation to Tower rooms
The tower rooms were modernised to an excellent standard are comfortable very clean and frankly hard to fault
Nice and newly renovated Tower wing room
Loved the new updated rooms facilities
newly renovated with stylish design
Loved that the Front Desk staff told me not to be alarmed if I saw someone in scuba gear in the pool after 10 pm they were doing maintenance
We were fortunate it be in the newly renovated family floor which is perfect for anyone travelling with kids
